title: Corrupt Desires
features: Phee knows that girls like her don’t get the fairytale…
Falling for a man like Bryant Holbrook is just begging for heartbreak. Rich boys don’t look twice at waitresses from the fog, at least... not until
. One smart-mouthed taunt and his turquoise eyes are all over her. That cocky, bad boy grin tempting her with the impossible.
It should have stayed a one-night stand.
Phee is pulled into a world of danger and corruption where Bryant must put everything at risk to keep her safe, or risk losing her to keep his father’s dream alive.
description: with a hefty dose of kink. It's a tale of a corrupt, tyrannicalstateand two people who find each other, despite coming from oppositeworlds. An
engaging read with a creative twist!

bestselling author in Dark Romance"Whenever Jennifer Bene comes out with a new release, I clear my schedule.
This book is based on an older set of novellas that are no longer available. They have been rewritten, revised into a single novel, and the story expanded to be dirtier, darker, and blisteringly hot!
